shared.model.game

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.game.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a user for playing games and authenticating as well
    Author:
    Raul Lopez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CatanColor color
      Color that represents the User described by CatanColor
      private Hand hand
      A Hand representing the cards of the User
      private PlayerName name
      A PlayerName representing the name of the User
      private java.util.ArrayList<Edge> occupiedEdges
      An ArrayList of Edges representing the edges that the User occupies
      private java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> occupiedVertices
      An ArrayList of Vertexes representing the edges that the User occupies
      private Password password
      A playerPassword representing the password of the User
      private int playerID
      An int representing the unique ID of the player.

      • purchaseDevCard

        public void purchaseDevCard()
                     throws InvalidMoveException
        Notifies the bank that the user would like to purchase a DevCard
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if the Bank is out of DevCards

      • canBuyPiece

        public boolean canBuyPiece(PieceType type)
        Determines whether a user can purchase a given Piece from the Bank
        Parameters:
        type - the desired type of Piece
        Returns:
        true if the user has sufficient ResourceCards, else false

      • purchasePiece

        public void purchasePiece()
                   throws InvalidMoveException
        Notifies the Bank that the user would like to purchase a Piece
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if the piece cannot be purchased

      • canPlayDevCard

        public boolean canPlayDevCard(DevCard devCard)
        Determines whether this player can play the given DevCard
        Parameters:
        devCard - the DevCard desired to be played
        Returns:
        true if the user owns the card and it can be played, else false
